Utlising his [[Susanoo]], Itachi performs a horizontal slash with the [[Sword of Totsuka]]. 

== Trivia ==
* [[wikipedia:Totsuka-no-Tsurugi|Ame-no-Ohabari]], in [[wikipedia: Japanese Mythology|Japanese mythology]], was a [[Sword of Totsuka]], used by [[wikipedia:Izanagi|Izanagi]] to kill his offspring, [[wikipedia:Kagu-tsuchi|Kagu-tsuchi]].
